movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sivaprasad Grandhe
Starring by: Samba Shiva, Santoshi Sharma
Genres: Drama, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Naa Kathalo Nenu is a Telugu movie starring Samba Shiva and Santoshi Sharma in the lead roles while it is produced, written and directed by Sivaprasad Grandhe.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Ram Ganpati Rao
Starring by: Neiraj Sham, Naira Shah, Sudhakar
Genres: Comedy, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Siddhu (Neeraj Shyam) is a young man who hates women completely. One fine day, a lady named Hasini(Nyra Shah) joins his office as his MD. Siddhu’s problems get even worse with time. One fine day, when Siddhu goes on a tour with his office mates, he gets into an argument with Hasini. An upset Siddhu starts swearing women which is overheard by a Swamiji who in turns curses Siddhu that he will soon fall in love with Hasini.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sameer Thahir
Staring by: Dulquer Salmaan, Sai Pallavi, Chemban Vinod Jose
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Hey Pillagada is a Telugu dub of the Malayalam movie, starring Dulquer Salmaan and Sai Pallavi in the role of a married couple, Siddharth and Anjali. They fall in love during their college days and get married once Siddharth starts working. The movie revolves around their story.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Ram Gopal Varma
Starring by: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Myra Sareen, Feroz Abbasi
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sivaji Rao is a Hyderabad based IPS officer who is posted as an SIT officer in Mumbai to handle the case of a corrupted cop called Narayan Pasari. Sivaji successfully manages to arrest Pasari but the latter uses all his influence and comes out of the jail and joins back in his duty. This time, he becomes even more lethal and starts targeting Sivaji.

movieInfo:
Directed and writtne by: Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava
Starring by: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt
Genres: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great French chef despite his family’s wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. When fate places Remy in the sewers of Paris, he finds himself ideally situated beneath a restaurant made famous by his culinary hero, Auguste Gusteau. Despite the apparent dangers of being an unlikely – and certainly unwanted – visitor in the kitchen of a fine French restaurant, Remy’s passion for cooking soon sets into motion a hilarious and exciting rat race that turns the culinary world of Paris upside down.

movieInfo:
Athade (Athadey) Info:
Directed by: Bejoy Nambiar
Written by: Karthik R. Iyer, Sreedevi Krishnan
Starring by: Dulquer Salmaan, Dhansika, Sai Tamhankar
Genres: Action, Drama, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Athadey revolves around four different people and the insights of their lives. Interesting part is that their stories are connected to the four different elements of earth : Earth, Fire, Wind and Water.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Frank Darabont
Written by: Stephen King, Frank Darabont
Starring by: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
Genres: Drama
Country: USA
Language: English
movieDescription: Chronicles the experiences of a formerly successful banker as a prisoner in the gloomy jailhouse of Shawshank after being found guilty of a crime he did not commit. The film portrays the man’s unique way of dealing with his new, torturous life; along the way he befriends a number of fellow prisoners, most notably a wise long-term inmate named Red.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Scott Stewart
Written by: Cory Goodman, Min-Woo Hyung
Starring by: Paul Bettany, Cam Gigandet, Maggie Q
Genres: Action, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: PRIEST, a post-apocalyptic sci-fi thriller, is set in an alternate world — one ravaged by centuries of war between man and vampires. The story revolves around a legendary Warrior Priest from the last Vampire War who now lives in obscurity among the other downtrodden human inhabitants in walled-in dystopian cities ruled by the Church. When his niece is abducted by a murderous pack of vampires, Priest breaks his sacred vows to venture out on a quest to find her before they turn her into one of them. He is joined on his crusade by his niece’s boyfriend, a trigger-fingered young wasteland sheriff, and a former Warrior Priestess who possesses otherworldly fighting skills.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Louis Morneau
Written by: John Logan
Starring by: Lou Diamond Phillips, Dina Meyer, Bob Gunton
Genres: Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Bats, the result of a government experiment gone wrong, have suddenly become intelligent, vicious, and omnivorous, and are attacking people near Gallup, Texas. Bat specialist Sheila Casper and her assistant Jimmy are brought in but can they stop the bats before the military comes in and, in their ignorance, makes things worse?

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vinod Kumar
Starring by: Ganja Karuppu, Richard Richie
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sanjay, the lead character, buys a mysterious house in a village. He gathers his friends and sets off on a mission to find out the hidden truth. The house is haunted, and Sanjay is curious to know why. Meanwhile, two of his friends are killed during their stay in the house. The quest to identify the murderer continues.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Challa Bhanu Kiran
Starring by: Tejas, Pallavi Dora, Vamsi Koduri
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film is about a group of college friends, who move to the U.S to pursue their higher studies. They encounter several funny incidents while re-discovering their friendship, love, and life in aboard.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anand K.V.
Written by: A.N. Balakrishnan, A.N. Balakrishnan
Starring by: Suriya, Tamannaah Bhatia, Prabhu
Genres: Action
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film’s story revolves around Deva, a youngster whose mother wants him to become a government official. He, on the other hand, works for a smuggling group run by Arumuga Dass who has been his mentor and looking after him since childhood. Conflict occurs when Deva’s arch rival, Kamalesh opposes and tries to eliminate Arumuga Dass from the smuggling business.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Milind Rau
Written by: Rahul Ramchandani, Milind Rau
Starring by: Siddharth, Andrea Jeremiah, Atul Kulkarni
Genres: Horror
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Krish (Siddharth), a neurosurgeon, and his wife Lakshmi (Andrea Jeremaiah), live in a secluded house on the foothills of the Himalayas when a businessman Paul (Atul Kulkarni) and his family move into the house next door and become friends.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Mani Nagaraj
Starring by: G V Prakash Kumar, Sri Divya, Sharik
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Pencil traces the story of a murder that occurs in a school, and the investigation that follows to find the killer. Shiva(G V Prakash) is a brilliant 12th standard student who is secretly in love with his class mate Maaya(Sri Divya). As time passes by, a star hero’s son, Nithin(Shariq Hassan) joins the school and becomes a huge head ache for all the girls in the school and also to the teachers who manage him. His notorious activities get to a point where everyone starts hating him big time. Twist in the tale arises when Nithin suddenly gets murdered in the school premises and both Shiva and Sri Divya stumble upon his dead body. Left with no choice, they decide to go behind the motive of this murder.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Steven C. Miller
Written by: Miles Chapman
Starring by: Dave Bautista, Baylee Curran, Sylvester Stallone
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: China, USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sequel to the 2013 film that featured a security expert named Ray Breslin, who used his skills to test out the reliability of maximum security prisons. Ray Breslin and his elite team of security specialists are trained in the art of breaking people out of the world’s most impenetrable prisons. When one of Ray’s trusted operatives, Shu Ren, is kidnapped and disappears inside Hades, the most elaborate prison ever built, Ray assembles a team to assist in the rescue.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Kumaresh Kumar
Starring by: Ramki, Meenakshi
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie revolves around Sanjeev, who goes to Chennai to earn some extra money. Things slowly started to take a turn as he got involves in many crimes in the process.
